content: If a payment is deducted but the status is failed, the amount is usually auto-refunded within 5-7 business days.
Refunds can be initiated from the Razorpay Dashboard. Instant refunds are available for select payment methods.
Razorpay supports Credit/Debit cards, UPI, Netbanking, Wallets, and EMI.
Settlements usually take T+2 days to reach your bank account.
International payments can be enabled from the settings menu in the dashboard. It requires PayPal integration or direct card support.
